entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
